title: Kindred
author: Octavia E. Butler
description: A classic time-travel narrative that explores slavery, memory, and inherited trauma.

title: The Body Keeps the Score
author: Bessel van der Kolk
description: A deep dive into trauma, the brain, and approaches to healing that combine science and practice.

title: Algorithms of Oppression
author: Safiya Umoja Noble
description: Examines how search engines reinforce racism and bias, especially against Black women and girls.

title: The Left Hand of Darkness
author: Ursula K. Le Guin
description: A foundational sci-fi novel that explores gender, politics, and power on the icy planet Gethen.

title: Invisible Man
author: Ralph Ellison
description: A powerful exploration of identity, race, and invisibility in twentieth-century America.
